description.value: A patchwork of humanoid flesh makes up a skinsaw mask, which is stitched together with black silk or wire. It is distinctive for its bulbous orange eye- crafted from a magical glass bauble-and wide row of teeth. When worn, the mask amplifies your ability to sense fear in other creatures. You know the value of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Frightened] condition of any @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Observed] creature, and you gain a +1 item bonus to Perception checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Seek] frightened creatures. Whenever you deal precision damage to a frightened creature, you deal 1 additional precision damage. If you are not evil, you are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Drained]{Drained 2} while wearing the skinsaw mask.
